summary: A dramatization of the British Expeditionary Force's 1940 retreat to the beaches of France and the extraordinary seaborne evacuation that saved it from utter destruction by Nazi Germany.
cast: John Mills|Richard Attenborough|Bernard Lee|Robert Urquhart|Ray Jackson|Ronald Hines|Sean Barrett|Roland Curram|Meredith Edwards|Michael Bates|Rodney Diak|Michael Shillo|Eddie Byrne|Maxine Audley|Lionel Jeffries|Victor Maddern|Anthony Nicholls|Bud Flanagan|Chesney Allen|Kenneth Cope|Denys Graham|Barry Foster|Warwick Ashton|Peter Halliday|John Welsh|Lloyd Lamble|Cyril Raymond|Nicholas Hannen|Patricia Plunkett|Michael Gwynn|Fred Griffiths|Dan Cressey|Christopher Rhodes|Harry Landis|John Horsley|Patrick Allen|John Adderley|Joss Ambler|Laurence Archer|Jack Armstrong|Arnold Bell|Michael Brennan|Olwen Brookes|Neville Chamberlain|Winston Churchill|Harold Coyne|Bernard Cribbins|Bob Danvers Walker|Geoffrey Denton|Arnold Diamond|Arthur Dibbs|Frank Forsyth|Liz Fraser|Thomas Graham|Aidan Harrington|John Harvey|John G. Heller|Glyn Houston|Barry Keegan|Howard Lang|Ian MacNaughton|Mary Maxfield|Kenneth Midwood|John Miller|Cecil Paul|Howard Pays|John Phillips|Frederick Piper|Charles Price|Philip Ray|Charles Rayford|Sheila Raynor|Ernie Rice|John Salew|John Serret|Harold Siddons|William Squire|Charles 'Bud' Tingwell|Tim Turner|Jim Tyson|Joe Wadham|John Stephen Walker|John Warwick|Mona Washbourne|Russell Waters|Del Watson|Peter Williams
title: Dunkerque
